Text: One of my fav films, thanks.

Thought-provoking, violent, sarcastic and incredibly intense, Natural Born Killers is a disturbingly accurate and explicit satire on the media and modern society. NBK is a very intelligent film which requires the viewer's fullest attention if all the subtexts, some blatant, some cryptic, are to be understood. ~ Edinburgh University Film Society
